name: 2D Platformer Re-Worked
description:
In this finalized version of the 2D Platformer Project, I made 3 modifications.

Modifications:

1. I created a custom song to play during the main menu section of my game. I used the composer feature in the app My Singing Monsters. I was going to make a new background for my game for my first modification but my iPad kept crashing and deleted my progress.

2. I created a custom song to play during the levels of my game. I used the composer feature in the app My Singing Monsters. This feature acts as a soundboard with different instruments and vocals.

3. I made level three more complex in comparison to the first two levels. In this level, you must jump on the head of your enemies to collect the key. 

Credits:

Created by: Kristina Malkowski
